content: {"name": "Lydia's Closet, St John's Lutheran Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Located at the education building behind the church. \nSocial media: https://www.facebook.com/IABTBAB17/ for distribution updates, weather closures or emergencies.\nFood distribution from our Blessing Pantry is by appointment only", "email": "", "url": "https://www.itsablessingtobeablessing.net/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "141 South Potomac Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hagerstown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21740", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.6398719, "longitude": -77.7222492}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 790-2510", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "00:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
